name: VR Tank Shooter - Cardboard
description:
Enjoy a shooter game in first person within a virtual reality inmersive environment. The scene where the action takes place is designed in a little darkness amazing place. Use your laser beam to point at the tank enemy, then automatically the rifle will shoot. Accomplish your mission destroying as many targets as possible and be warned that the enemies will try to catch you. Aim with the laser pointer at the enemies and kill them all.
There is no need of any button nor NFC. So you can play just moving your head around.

VR Tank Shooter is designed to provide you a real-time feel of a nice shooter training.

Check the already written reviews:
***** I like the sensation inside de room, and the laser beam is really great! (By JohanCruff, 5 stars)
***** This is a powerful virtual tanks game. (By Thomascrown1, 5 stars)
***** A futuristic game in my device, an amazing experience, in my hands, feel the new wow! (By Sergi Lanau, 5 stars)

HOW TO PLAY
-Just move your head around, with 360º and score the enemies using the targeting of the beam laser.


Experience this thrilling game using:
- Google Cardboard or other similar VR glasses.
- It is highly recommended to use headphones, so heard the binaural background sound (3D stereo sound sensation).
